subject: AI & Agents
title: Open Source vs. Closed AI
description: One-minute skill: Open Source vs. Closed AI.

hook.text: Meta releases Llama for free. OpenAI keeps GPT-4 locked. Who's right about AI's future?

buildup.text: Open-source AI democratizes access â€” researchers, startups, and countries can all build on it.

discovery.text: Closed models allow companies to control safety, prevent misuse, and monetize their investment.

twist.text: Open models get fine-tuned for harmful uses. Closed models concentrate power in a few companies.

climax.text: The debate isn't settled. Both approaches have legitimate safety and innovation arguments.

punchline.text: Open the gates or guard the castle. Both have consequences.

quiz.question: What is a key concern about open-source AI models?
options: They can be fine-tuned for harmful uses with no oversight
They are always less capable than closed models
